body_html:
To clarify, although the quoted workaround uses numpy function as an example. They could be implemented in TensorFlow using their TF counterpart: tf.argmax and tf.log, without invoking eval().

And yes, we will likely to make something similar to tf.multinomial at some point. We are still discussing how we should do it.
body_text:
To clarify, although the quoted workaround uses numpy function as an example. They could be implemented in TensorFlow using their TF counterpart: tf.argmax and tf.log, without invoking eval().
And yes, we will likely to make something similar to tf.multinomial at some point. We are still discussing how we should do it.
body:
To clarify, although the quoted workaround uses numpy function as an example. They could be implemented in TensorFlow using their TF counterpart: tf.argmax and tf.log, without invoking eval(). 

And yes, we will likely to make something similar to tf.multinomial at some point. We are still discussing how we should do it.
